channel.title: BNP MP candidate gets into a fight with a group of Asian men.
channel.description:
[url]https://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk_politics/election_2010/england/8663681.stm[/url]
Why am I not suprisied by this clash? :hmph:
To those who are not from the UK: The BNP is basically the English fascism party. They don't like ethnic minorities and until recently, only people who are white could become members.

item.title: BNP MP candidate gets into a fight with a group of Asian men.
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
hercule poirots nutsack:

indians, pakistanis, and bangladeshis all outnumber east asians in britain so we call them asians because all those countries are also in asia. east asians are known here as chinamen or “ornamentals”

I understand what Asia covers but applying the term Asian to every fucking province kind of makes it a useless identifier. I only use it for North Eastern Asian countries.

Read full topic

item.title: BNP MP candidate gets into a fight with a group of Asian men.
item.dc:creator: taxi_evil
item.description:
mental2k:

At least they don’t get any seats, unlike Northern Ireland where terrorists get voted into seats.

Don’t get me started on that… it’ll be about 35 seconds before the word ‘Enniskillen’ is uttered…

Fun fact: A mate of mine looked up the tail number of the spitfire they used on one of their posters. It’s from a Polish squadron, proving once again that they’re thick as well as racist

Read full topic
item.source: BNP MP candidate gets into a fight with a group of Asian men.

item.title: BNP MP candidate gets into a fight with a group of Asian men.
item.dc:creator: mental2k
item.description:
Unfortunately its not just the morally decrepid that that are starting to vote for the BNP. They have put a thin veneer on their policies recently, and to many older and less well informed people they appear to be a party who’s just trying to be British. They use Winston Churchill to this end and they’re using the great man to sell Nazi-esque policies.

At least they don’t get any seats, unlike Northern Ireland where terrorists get voted into seats.

Read full topic

item.title: BNP MP candidate gets into a fight with a group of Asian men.
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
baconeggs:

Fucking hell, why does only Britain describe Indian-descended people as “Asian”?

I see no evidence they were ‘Indian-descended’, whatever that even means. However, they most certainly are of an Asian ethnicity.

item.source: BNP MP candidate gets into a fight with a group of Asian men.

item.title: BNP MP candidate gets into a fight with a group of Asian men.
item.dc:creator: taxi_evil
item.description:
BNP generally gets support from people who have trouble pronouncing ‘politics’, let alone educating themselves about it. Therefore there’s a lot of moaning when they get to a polling station and find that there isn’t actually a BNP candidate in their constituency…

The leadership of the party is in complete disarray, and they only entered the election to gain control of one or two local councils. It looks unlikely that it’ll happen, but you never know

Unfortunately this would mean that things likes social housing and schools will be subject to their racist policies. It sounds melodramatic, but you can’t join their party unless you’re white

Read full topic

item.description:
Do people actually vote for these fuckwads?

And a quick visit to Wikipedia shows…almost no, but have somehow put members in the EP, London Assembly and various Local Governments…
